question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. "new york post" container
B. blue "NYC" sign
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The "new york post" container is on the sidewalk in the foreground, while the "NYC" sign is on a pole further back, making the container clearly closer to the camera.
